TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Sudan, title = Sudan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sudan} }

S.FORM: Sudan hya' ga cyux maki' tay 15 00 N, 30 00 E na Xweco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 1,861,484 sq km (maki' tay 16ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga ) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 36,729,501. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 100% , lhlahuy hya' ga 0%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 0%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Khartoum. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay qutux byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Omar al-Bashir, aring ryax 16 squ byacing tay 10 sa kawas 1993 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Sodan hya' ga cyox maki' tay 15 00 N, 30 00 E na Xweco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 1,861,484 sq km (maki' tay 16ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga ) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 36,729,501. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 100% , lhlahoy hya' ga 0%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 0%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Khartoom. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay qotox byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Omar al-Bashir, aring ryax 16 sqo byacing tay 10 sa kawas 1993 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
